traits.Amphibious: The beast can breathe both air and water.
traits.Primal Bond: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.Binding Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.
